item.title: DAIMLER-BENZ AROCS AGRAR 1.54-1.55.x ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 11, 2025

DAIMLER-BENZ AROCS AGRAR 1.54-1.55.x ATS

v4.0 Changes:
Adaptation to ATS 1.55.x.
Adapted to new SCS cargo system.
Mod totally reworked.
MPH speedometer.
Added new cistern trailer & 4 cargos (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added new cistern truck body (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Double & triple trailers (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Fixed blinker lights.
Adjusted reflex parts intensity.
Improved plate light.
Added “LONG VEHICLE & ROAD TRAIN” sign (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added rear strobe light (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Some changes on DEF files.
Other minor corrections.

FULL version includes:
Truck & trailer integrated in one mod.
Metallic paints & skins support.
Double & triple trailers.
Kipper & cistern trailers.
“LONG VEHICLE & ROAD TRAIN” sign.
Rear beacon.
All cargos.
All roof grill models.
All bumper grill models.
All accesories options.
Exhaust smoke.
Chromed wheel cover.
Truck in truck browser.
Trailer in trailer browser.
Get instructions. Send me an email.

Credits: CyrusThe, Maxi.S, Chris Dre, Kevin Funke, Matze, STv-Modding (mod for FS17).

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes LP 331 Rigido Modfy wagner lima V1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 11, 2025

Mercedes LP 331 Rigido Modfy wagner lima V1.0 ETS2

The request “Mercedes LP 331 Rigido Modfy wagner lima” seems to be a combination of a classic truck model and a name. Based on the search results, “Wagner Lima” is associated with a specific, highly customized Mercedes-Benz LP 331 Rigido truck.

It appears this particular truck is a popular subject within the Brazilian truck and simulator community, especially on YouTube. The searches point to a variety of videos and discussions about this model, often showcasing modifications and restorations.

While the name “Wagner Lima” is consistently linked to this truck, there’s no single, definitive source detailing every single modification. Instead, the information is spread across multiple videos and community posts where people discuss the truck’s features. These discussions often highlight:

Exterior Modifications: Custom paint, reinforced bumpers, protective grilles for lights, and custom exhaust systems.
Interior Features: The inclusion of a CB radio (PX), custom curtains, and a highly detailed, modified cabin.
Performance Upgrades: The installation of more powerful engines and other performance-enhancing parts.

In short, the “Mercedes LP 331 Rigido Modfy Wagner Lima” is not just a standard truck, but a unique, customized vehicle that has become a recognizable figure in the truck enthusiast community, particularly in Brazil. It’s a great example of how enthusiasts modify classic vehicles to create something truly personal and special.

Credits: wagner lima

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DC3D Comil Campione 3.25 V1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 11, 2025

DC3D Comil Campione 3.25 V1.0 ETS2

The DC3D Comil Campione 3.25 is a popular and highly detailed mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). It brings the Brazilian-made Comil Campione 3.25 coach to life in the game, allowing players to experience a unique part of bus transport culture. The “DC3D” part of the name refers to the mod creator, who is well-known for producing high-quality bus mods, especially those from Brazil and Latin America.

Key Features of the Mod
The DC3D Comil Campione 3.25 is celebrated in the ETS2 community for its realism and extensive customization. Here are some of its standout features:
Detailed Realism: The mod is praised for its accurate recreation of the actual bus, from the exterior bodywork to the dashboard and interior layout. This includes realistic textures, lighting, and an immersive sound pack that mimics the real engine.
Chassis and Engine Options: Unlike many mods that are limited to a single chassis, the DC3D version often offers a “multi-chassis” setup. This means you can choose between different engine and chassis options from real manufacturers like Scania, Volvo, and Mercedes-Benz, giving you a variety of driving experiences.
Customization: A major draw of the mod is the ability to personalize the bus. Players can:
Add real-world skins and liveries from Brazilian bus companies.
Customize interior elements like the steering wheel, curtains, and GPS.
Adjust details like window tint, mirrors, and even add a copilot.
Functional Animations: The mod includes various functional animations, such as doors that open and close, animated windows, and in some versions, even passengers inside the bus.
The DC3D Comil Campione 3.25 is an excellent example of how the modding community enhances the ETS2 experience, providing players with access to a rich and diverse range of vehicles not found in the base game.

Credits: dc3d

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: DC3D Marcopolo G.6 MB v2.5 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 11, 2025

DC3D Marcopolo G.6 MB v2.5 ETS2

The DC3D Marcopolo G6_MB_v2.5 is a highly detailed and popular mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). It was created by the well-known Brazilian modding group DC3D, which specializes in bringing realistic bus models to the game.
This mod is an updated version of a previous release, with “v2.5” indicating that it has been refined and improved with new features. It is a fantastic example of the passion and talent within the ETS2 modding community.

Key Features of the Mod
The DC3D Marcopolo G6_MB_v2.5 stands out for its high level of detail, realism, and a wide range of customization options.
Bus Model: The mod is based on the Marcopolo Paradiso G6, a classic and iconic coach model from Brazil.
Chassis: The “MB” in the name stands for Mercedes-Benz. Specifically, the mod uses a Mercedes-Benz chassis, such as the O-500RS BlueTec 5, which is a common and powerful chassis for buses in Brazil. This provides a realistic and authentic driving experience.
Customization: The mod offers extensive customization, allowing players to personalize the bus to their liking. These options often include:
Skins: A large number of real-world skins from various bus companies, mainly from Brazil.
Interior: Different interior options like seat upholstery, curtains, and dashboard accessories.
Accessories: The ability to add or remove various external accessories like rear stickers and chrome details.
Realistic Elements: The mod includes high-quality details to make the experience more immersive, such as:
Animations: The bus features animated doors and windows.
Sounds: It has its own custom sound pack that is designed to mimic the real Mercedes-Benz engine.
Physics: The mod’s physics are tuned to simulate the feeling of driving a real bus of that size and weight.
Overall, the DC3D Marcopolo G6_MB_v2.5 is a must-have for ETS2 players who are fans of bus simulation, especially those who appreciate the unique and rich transport culture of Brazil.

Credits: dc3d

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
